item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

This is a conversion of Cruels MoveMoseSmooth function in VB:

procedure MoveMouseSmooth(x, y: Integer);
var
  src, tmp: TPoint;
  steps, diffx, diffy: Integer;
begin
  steps := 150;
  while steps > 0 do
  begin
    src := Mouse.CursorPos;
    diffx := Round((x - src.X) / steps);
    diffy := Round((y - src.Y) / steps);
    if (Round(diffx) <> 0) or (Round(diffy) <> 0) then
    begin
      tmp.x := Round(src.x + diffx);
      tmp.y := Round(src.y + diffy);
      SetCursorPos(tmp.x, tmp.y);
      Wait(1);
    end;
    steps := steps - 1
  end;
end;

This needs the wait function: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1381.0.html
